001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.output;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
004import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.Property;
005
006/**
007 * Builder to create {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput }.
008 * Creates file output.
009 * <table class="table">
010 * <caption><strong>Properties retrieved from LogProperties</strong></caption>
011 * <tr>
012 * <th>Property Pattern</th>
013 * <th>Type</th>
014 * <th>Required</th>
015 * <th>Default</th>
016 * <th>Description</th>
017 * </tr>
018 * <tr>
019 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_uri }</code></td>
020 * <td><code>URI</code></td>
021 * <td><code>false</code></td>
022 * <td><code>null</code></td>
023 * <td>File uri.</td>
024 * </tr>
025 * <tr>
026 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_fileName }</code></td>
027 * <td><code>String</code></td>
028 * <td><code>false</code></td>
029 * <td><code>null</code></td>
030 * <td>File name.</td>
031 * </tr>
032 * <tr>
033 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_append }</code></td>
034 * <td><code>Boolean</code></td>
035 * <td><code>false</code></td>
036 * <td><code>null</code></td>
037 * <td>Whether or not to append to existing file.</td>
038 * </tr>
039 * <tr>
040 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_prudent }</code></td>
041 * <td><code>Boolean</code></td>
042 * <td><code>false</code></td>
043 * <td><code>null</code></td>
044 * <td>Logback prudent mode where files are locked on each write.</td>
045 * </tr>
046 * <tr>
047 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_bufferSize }</code></td>
048 * <td><code>Integer</code></td>
049 * <td><code>true</code></td>
050 * <td>{@value io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput#DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE }</td>
051 * <td>Buffer size in bytes.</td>
052 * </tr>
053 * </table>
054 */
055public final class FileOutputBuilder {
056
057        /**
058         * The properties to be retrieved from config will have
059         * this prefix.
060         */
061        static final String PROPERTY_PREFIX = "logging.output.{name}.";
062        
063        /**
064         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_uri } = java.net.URI</code> File uri.
065         */
066        static final String PROPERTY_uri = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "uri";
067        /**
068         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_fileName } = java.lang.String</code> File name.
069         */
070        static final String PROPERTY_fileName = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "fileName";
071        /**
072         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_append } = java.lang.Boolean</code> Whether or not to append to existing file.
073         */
074        static final String PROPERTY_append = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "append";
075        /**
076         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_prudent } = java.lang.Boolean</code> Logback prudent mode where files are locked on each write.
077         */
078        static final String PROPERTY_prudent = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "prudent";
079        /**
080         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_bufferSize } = java.lang.Integer</code> Buffer size in bytes.
081         */
082        static final String PROPERTY_bufferSize = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "bufferSize";
083        
084        private final String propertyPrefix;
085        final Property<java.net.URI> property_uri;
086        final Property<java.lang.String> property_fileName;
087        final Property<java.lang.Boolean> property_append;
088        final Property<java.lang.Boolean> property_prudent;
089        final Property<java.lang.Integer> property_bufferSize;
090        
091        private final java.lang.String name;
092        private java.net.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable URI uri = null;
093        private java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable String fileName = null;
094        private java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean append = null;
095        private java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean prudent = null;
096        private java.lang.Integer bufferSize = io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput.DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE;
097        
098        /**
099         * Create a builder for {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput }.
100         * @param name will fill <code>{name}</code> in <code>logging.output.{name}.</code>. Name of output not file name.
101         */
102        public FileOutputBuilder(
103                        java.lang.String name
104                        ) {
105                java.util.Map<String,String> prefixParameters = java.util.Map.of(
106                                "name", name
107                        );
108                this.propertyPrefix = LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_PREFIX, prefixParameters);
109                this.name = name;
110                property_uri = Property.builder()
111                        .toURI()
112                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_uri, prefixParameters));
113
114                property_fileName = Property.builder()
115                                                .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_fileName, prefixParameters));
116
117                property_append = Property.builder()
118                        .toBoolean()
119                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_append, prefixParameters));
120
121                property_prudent = Property.builder()
122                        .toBoolean()
123                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_prudent, prefixParameters));
124
125                property_bufferSize = Property.builder()
126                        .toInt()
127                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_bufferSize, prefixParameters));
128
129        }
130
131
132        
133        /**
134         * Sets uri.
135         * File uri.
136         * Default is <code>null</code>.
137         * @param uri <code>{@value #PROPERTY_uri } = java.net.URI</code> File uri.
138         * @return this builder.
139         */
140        public FileOutputBuilder uri(java.net.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable URI uri) {
141                this.uri = uri;
142                return this;
143        }
144        
145        /**
146         * Sets fileName.
147         * File name.
148         * Default is <code>null</code>.
149         * @param fileName <code>{@value #PROPERTY_fileName } = java.lang.String</code> File name.
150         * @return this builder.
151         */
152        public FileOutputBuilder fileName(java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable String fileName) {
153                this.fileName = fileName;
154                return this;
155        }
156        
157        /**
158         * Sets append.
159         * Whether or not to append to existing file.
160         * Default is <code>null</code>.
161         * @param append <code>{@value #PROPERTY_append } = java.lang.Boolean</code> Whether or not to append to existing file.
162         * @return this builder.
163         */
164        public FileOutputBuilder append(java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean append) {
165                this.append = append;
166                return this;
167        }
168        
169        /**
170         * Sets prudent.
171         * Logback prudent mode where files are locked on each write.
172         * Default is <code>null</code>.
173         * @param prudent <code>{@value #PROPERTY_prudent } = java.lang.Boolean</code> Logback prudent mode where files are locked on each write.
174         * @return this builder.
175         */
176        public FileOutputBuilder prudent(java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean prudent) {
177                this.prudent = prudent;
178                return this;
179        }
180        
181        /**
182         * Sets <strong>required</strong> bufferSize.
183         * Buffer size in bytes.
184         * Default is {@value io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput#DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE }.
185         * @param bufferSize <code>{@value #PROPERTY_bufferSize } = java.lang.Integer</code> Buffer size in bytes.
186         * @return this builder.
187         */
188        public FileOutputBuilder bufferSize(java.lang.Integer bufferSize) {
189                this.bufferSize = bufferSize;
190                return this;
191        }
192        
193        /**
194         * Creates {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput } from this builder.
195         * @return {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput }.
196         * @throws java.io.UncheckedIOException if factory method fails.
197         */
198        public io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput build()  throws java.io.UncheckedIOException{
199                return io.jstach.rainbowgum.output.FileOutput.of(
200                                this.name
201                                , this.uri
202                                , this.fileName
203                                , this.append
204                                , this.prudent
205                                , property_bufferSize.require(this.bufferSize)
206                                );
207        }
208        
209        /**
210         * Fills the builder from properties.
211         * @param properties not null.
212         * @return this updated builder.
213         */
214        public FileOutputBuilder fromProperties(LogProperties properties) {
215                this.uri = property_uri.get(properties).valueOrNull(this.uri);
216                this.fileName = property_fileName.get(properties).valueOrNull(this.fileName);
217                this.append = property_append.get(properties).valueOrNull(this.append);
218                this.prudent = property_prudent.get(properties).valueOrNull(this.prudent);
219                this.bufferSize = property_bufferSize.get(properties).value(this.bufferSize);
220                return this;
221        }
222        
223        /**
224         * Turns the builder into java.util.Properties like Map skipping values that are null.
225         * @param consumer apply is called where first arg is key and second is value.
226         */
227        public void toProperties(java.util.function.BiConsumer<String, String> consumer) {
228                var _uri = this.uri;
229                if (_uri != null) {
230                        consumer.accept(property_uri.key(), property_uri.propertyString(_uri));
231                }
232                var _fileName = this.fileName;
233                if (_fileName != null) {
234                        consumer.accept(property_fileName.key(), property_fileName.propertyString(_fileName));
235                }
236                var _append = this.append;
237                if (_append != null) {
238                        consumer.accept(property_append.key(), property_append.propertyString(_append));
239                }
240                var _prudent = this.prudent;
241                if (_prudent != null) {
242                        consumer.accept(property_prudent.key(), property_prudent.propertyString(_prudent));
243                }
244                var _bufferSize = this.bufferSize;
245                if (_bufferSize != null) {
246                        consumer.accept(property_bufferSize.key(), property_bufferSize.propertyString(_bufferSize));
247                }
248        }
249        
250        /**
251         * The interpolated property prefix: {@value #PROPERTY_PREFIX}.
252         * @return resolved prefix which should end with a "<code>.</code>".
253         */
254        public String propertyPrefix() {
255                return this.propertyPrefix;
256        }
257        
258}
